title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Smoking and Health
purpose: To monitor and discuss the health and social effects of smoking; to review potential changes in existing legislation to reduce levels of smoking; to assess the latest medical techniques to assist in smoking cessation; and to act as a resource for the groupâ€™s members on all issues relating to smoking and public health.
